text: Yudaya no (ho ni shitagau)-sha ni wa, ware wa subete no tsume no aru dobutsu o kinji, mata ushi to hitsuji wa, sono abura o kinjita. Tada se to naizo ni fuchaku shi, matawa hone ni tsuranatta abura wa,-betsudearu. Kore wa, kare-ra no fusei koi ni taisuru oho de, ware wa hontoni shinjitsudearu
